mapper.select: select a.id,a.good_id,a.number,d.name,d.url, c.at_img, COUNT(d.name) as sum from tb_produce a,tb_user_produce b,tb_attendant c,tb_goods d where b.produce_id=a.id and a.attendant_id=c.id and a.good_id=d.id and b.user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY a.id

select max(b.attendant_id) as 'attendantId',sum(b.number) as 'number',max(c.id) as 'goodId' ,max(c.name) as 'goodName',max(c.url) as 'imgUrl' from tb_user_produce a join tb_produce b on a.produce_id = b.id join tb_goods c on b.good_id = c.id where a.user_id= #{userId} group by b.attendant_id,c.id
